pageTitle: Public events for December 2, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, December 2, 2015:

Ottawa

10:00 a.m. – The Prime Minister attends a National Caucus meeting.

Centre Block, Room 237-C
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.

Ottawa

7:00 p.m. – The Prime Minister participates in the launch of the 31st Christmas Lights Across Canada. The annual ceremony will include the illumination of hundreds of thousands of mutlicoloured lights, live performances by Canadian singer Measha Brueggergosman and the Ottawa Regional Youth Choir, a pyrotechnics show, and the launch of an all-new multimedia projection show.

Parliament Hill
Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media will have access to an area with risers on the central walk in front of the stage; it is accessible from the east driveway.
  • An audio feed will be available to media at that location.
  • Parking is available on the lower west driveway for live broadcast vehicles only.
  • An RSVP for live broadcast vehicles must be sent by 10 a.m. on Wednesday, December 2 to PCH.media-media.PCH@Canada.ca. Members of the media are asked to provide the driver’s name and cellular phone number, and the licence plate number.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
